title: BlockPro
subtitle: Decentralized Social Media
description: BlockPro is a Web3 social media app where users publish posts on the Ethereum blockchain. It was built to explore censorship-resistant platforms and user-owned content.
features: Ethereum blockchain smart contracts using Solidity and Hardhat
Frontend built with React and styled for a futuristic UI
Posts stored and fetched from the blockchain using Ethers.js

title: Rent Storage
subtitle: Website for Storage Rental Business
description: A modern and responsive website developed for Rent Storage, a real-world storage rental service operating in Amora and Arrentela. The site showcases the business, highlights its benefits, and allows potential customers to learn more and get in touch.
features: Responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop
Modern hero section with call-to-action and custom branding
Animated hamburger menu with smooth transitions
Custom contact section and modern footer with icons

title: Degustação Alentejana
subtitle: Website for Catering & Events Business
description: A clean and responsive website built for Degustação Alentejana, a traditional catering service based in Alentejo. The site reflects the brand’s rustic identity, showcases its services and events, and provides visitors with a clear understanding of the company’s offerings.
features: Responsive layout optimized for mobile and desktop
Fixed navigation bar with centered logo and side links
Hero section with background image, title, and slogan
About section with descriptive text and overlapping images
Animated service cards with hover effects
Organized image gallery with interactive hover styling
Glossy effect on navbar when scrolling
